meanings.definition: The layer of material between the outsole and insole of a shoe.
meanings.sent1: The midsole provides cushioning for the foot.
meanings.sent2: Make sure the midsole is properly aligned in the shoe.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat thought the midsole was a perfect napping spot.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter echoed through the room, bouncing off the midsole of her sneakers.
meanings.sent5: The bright red midsole contrasted beautifully with the white shoe.

meanings.definition: To place a midsole in a shoe for added support.
meanings.sent1: He will midsole the new shoes before wearing them.
meanings.sent2: Remember to midsole carefully to ensure comfort.
meanings.sent3: She decided to midsole her old sneakers for a DIY project.
meanings.sent4: The chef midsoled the shoes with extra padding for a long day of cooking.
meanings.sent5: Midsole the shoes gently to avoid damaging the material.
